original_title: Is Anybody Coming Over to Dinner?
overview: Melbourne-based filmmaker Audrey Lam, a member of the highly regarded Artists’ Film Workshop, presents a diary portrait following the seven-year-old child, Yoki, in a multilingual Japanese-German-Australian family in the months following the birth of his brother. This instinctive piece of personal storytelling captures a child’s way of seeing the world through rhythm, feeling and vivid images of childhood growth and familial connection.
title: Is Anybody Coming Over to Dinner?
